title: p5.js
desc: This is a javascript framework for creating interactive visuals and games!

title: HTML5
desc: This is the backbone of all the websites you see. This creates the structure of a website.

title: CSS3
desc: Humans wanted to make websites look attractive - they made CSS. This helps in making websites look beautiful.

title: Javascript
desc: This makes websites interactive. To put it simply, it is the brain of a website.

title: jQuery
desc: jQuery is a javascript framework that makes writing javascript code way too easy and sweet to look at.

title: SASS
desc: SASS is a CSS framework and includes a lot of beautiful features that makes writing CSS sweet.

title: Vue.js
desc: This is a front-end javascript framework that makes creating a bit heavy front-end websites easy.

title: Node.js
desc: Javascript in the backend! Yes, Node is a runtime environment to use JS in backend.

title: Express.js
desc: This is a Node.js framework and easy to write server-side code.

title: MongoDB
desc: This is a NoSQL Database and very easy to use if you already know about Javascript Objects.

title: Git
desc: Git is a version-control system and it is very helpful to deploy websites, collaborate and track your code.

title: Font Awesome
desc: Icons that make the site look so pretty!

title: Bash
desc: Bash runs operations in your device and hosts websites online.
